text.div:
Generated Narrative: OperationDefinition SubmitEncounterBundle

URL: [base]/Bundle/$submit-encounter-bundle

Parameters

UseNameScopeCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INbundle1..1Bundle

The GPlusEncounterBundle containing the encounter and all referenced resources (Patient, Encounter, Location, Organization, Provenance).

OUTreturn1..1Bundle

On success: The accepted Bundle with assigned IDs. On failure: An OperationOutcome detailing validation errors.

name: SubmitEncounterBundle
title: Submit Encounter Bundle
description: This operation accepts a GPlus Encounter Bundle containing encounter data and all referenced resources. The system validates the bundle for plausibility and integrity. On success, the data is accepted and stored. On failure, an OperationOutcome is returned with details about validation errors.

parameter.name: bundle
parameter.documentation: The GPlusEncounterBundle containing the encounter and all referenced resources (Patient, Encounter, Location, Organization, Provenance).

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: On success: The accepted Bundle with assigned IDs. On failure: An OperationOutcome detailing validation errors.
